entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Owned entity not loaded if PK has a value converter #26116
  • Migrate Column Collation Fails When Column Used As Key #26115

Closed

  • EF Core ignores owned entity column in entity update when the entity has primary key with value conversion #23700
    6.0.0
  • Throw a better exception when using EF Core tooling with MAUI #25938
    6.0.0
  • Update ShouldUseSameServiceProvider implementation for empty options #26109
    6.0.0
  • Exception when creating SQLite DB in when targetting osx-arm64 / .Net 6 (preview) #24198
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migration loop in m:n relation with custom schema #23937
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Update the entity type on check constraints when it's converted to a STET #26112
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26110
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [6.0] Tools: Check for unsupported OS-specific TFMs #26094
  • Add a check to ShouldUseSameServiceProvider even when the extension has no options #26111
    providers-beware
  • Always store join table schema in the snapshot. #26095
  • When sorting update commands add Deleted + Inserted number of edges instead of Deleted * Inserted #26082

Updated

  • [6.0] Code cleanup on EFCore project #26100
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.20.1 to 3.21.0 #26001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • More GroupBy tests #26105
